scripts.tauri:build:desktop: tauri build && rm -rf "$HOME/Desktop/Instant Writer Pro.app" && cp -R "src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/Instant Writer Pro.app" "$HOME/Desktop/Instant Writer Pro.app"
scripts.tauri:build:dock: tauri build && mkdir -p "$HOME/Applications" && rm -rf "$HOME/Applications/Instant Writer Pro.app" && cp -R "src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/Instant Writer Pro.app" "$HOME/Applications/Instant Writer Pro.app" && rm -rf "$HOME/Desktop/Instant Writer Pro.app" && cp -R "src-tauri/target/release/bundle/macos/Instant Writer Pro.app" "$HOME/Desktop/Instant Writer Pro.app"
